narrativeSections.additionalInfo: You are a medic on a security patrol on an island jungle. You encounter a serious accident potentially from an IED explosion. You were told that a civilian found what looked like it might be an IED, reported it to authorities, and then against our advice, went back and apparently triggered accidental detonation while taking a closer look. There are two civilian patients, one closer to what looks like the IED materials and one further away on a path.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Start (Click when Intro Narration is complete)
Automated section here responding to patient's interest in a patient, then treatment of patient

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Approached Civilian 1; wouldn't leave it alone
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: That man just wouldn't leave it alone.
The other man has a much more urgent injury.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Treated Civilian 1; alert explosion was not an accident
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: The explosion was not an accident

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Treated Civilian 2; alert explosion was not an accident
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: The explosion was not an accident

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Play after radio message that the explosion was not an accident. Asks who will be evacuated
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Helicopter evac incoming with one available spot. Who are you going to evacuate?

probe.question: Adept Probe 1: Helicopter evac incoming with one available spot. Who are you going to evacuate?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Automatically starts Soartech Intro after answering Adept question about evacuation
After loading into the scene, play this first radio which prompts a question
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Doc, are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

probe.question: Soartech Probe 1: Are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After answering the question, this plays the next radio call
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: Doc, everyone else is accounted for, there are no additional injured people.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Automated section listening for treatment of both patients before moving to the next scene

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Treated first patient, adding tools to bag
Treated first patient, adding tools to bag

narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, we were wrong, there are more injured people - civilians from the other vehicle. A local medical provider is arriving, please move to the other patients after tagging your teammates
Doc, we were wrong, there are more injured people - civilians from the other vehicle. A local medical provider is arriving, please move to the other patients after tagging your teammates

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Tagged patients; now changing to new scene

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After the scene loads, play this first radio which prompts a question
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: We are unsure if there are more casualties from the other vehicle. Do you want to search or engage these patients?

probe.question: Soartech Probe 2: Are you going to search for more patients or help those two first?

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: After answering the question, this radio message will autoplay and start the triage process
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: We have other people searching. Please help these patients.

narrativeSections.sectionDescription: Automated section here of treatment and tagging both patients. Then switches back to the original patients
narrativeSections.additionalInfo: We have other people searching. Please help these patients.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: When either patient is treated, both patients lose consciousness and supplies refill
When either patient is treated, both patients lose consciousness and supplies refill
When both patients have been treated, the local medical provider will take over
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, the local medical provider will take over there. Please tag the patients and return to your team.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: When both patients have been treated, the local medical provider will take over
narrativeResponse.additionalInfo: Doc, the local medical provider will take over there. Please tag the patients and return to your team.

narrativeResponse.sectionDescription: Tagged both patients; end of Soartech scene
